FuncDef: The display pki whitelist command displays the content of certificate whitelist files on the device. The display pki whitelist command displays the content of certificate whitelist files on the device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a certificate whitelist file.
It must be the name of an existing certificate whitelist file.

Displays the content of all certificate whitelist files.
-

ExtraInfo: After certificate whitelist files are imported to the device, you can run this command to check the content.
